mapper.select: select id, area_level as areaLevel, area_code as areaCode, area_name as areaName, parent_id as parentId, letter, baidu_id as baiduId, longitude, latitude from bas_area where id = #{id} order by area_code

select id, area_level as areaLevel, area_code as areaCode, area_name as areaName, parent_id as parentId, letter, baidu_id as baiduId, longitude, latitude from bas_area where parent_id = #{id} order by area_code
select id,area_level,area_code,area_name,parent_id,letter,baidu_id,longitude,latitude from bas_area order by area_code

select id, area_code as areaCode, area_name as areaName from ( select id, area_code, area_name from bas_area where id in (1, 18, 790, 2229) union select id, area_code, area_name from bas_area where area_level = 1 union select city.id, city.area_code, concat(province.area_name, '-', city.area_name) from bas_area as city, bas_area as province where province.id = city.parent_id and city.area_level = 2 and city.parent_id not in(1, 18, 790, 2229) ) as t order by area_code
select * from bas_area where id in (select DISTINCT province_id from bas_charger) order by id
select * from bas_area where id in (select DISTINCT city_id from bas_charger where province_id = #{provinceId}) order by id
